kDesc
Sultans and Ameerahs must show they have excellent taste, not only in their choice of clothing and entertainments, but also in their choice of furnishings. [#Legal]
Sultans et Ameerahs se doivent de montrer à quel point ils ont bon goût, non seulement dans le choix de leurs vêtements et de leurs loisirs, mais aussi dans celui de leurs meubles. [#Legal]
Sultane und Ameerahs müssen stets ihren hervorragenden Geschmack beweisen: nicht nur bei Kleidung und Unterhaltung, sondern auch bei der Wahl ihrer Möbel. [#Legal]
Sultani e principesse devono dimostrare di avere un gusto eccellente non solo nella scelta degli abiti e dell'intrattenimento, ma anche in quella degli arredi. [#Legal]
Los sultanes y las princesas árabes no solo deben demostrar buen gusto al vestir, sino también al decorar su palacio. [#Legal]
皇帝と王女のセンスを疑われないように、ファッションやエンターテイメントだけでなく、家具にもそのセンスを光らせる必要がある。 [#Legal]
술탄과 아미라는 의상과 여흥에 대한 선호뿐 아니라 가구의 선택에서도 그들의 뛰어난 취향을 보여 줘야 하니까요. [#Legal]
Sultans and Ameerahs must show they have excellent taste, not only in their choice of clothing and entertainments, but also in their choice of furnishings. [#Legal]
蘇丹王和阿拉伯公主必須展現超越常人的品味，不但要有頂級的衣服和娛樂，就連傢俱也不能馬虎。 [#Legal]
蘇丹王和阿拉伯公主必須展現超越常人的品味，不但要有頂級的衣服和娛樂，就連傢俱也不能馬虎。 [#Legal]
Sultans and Ameerahs must show they have excellent taste, not only in their choice of clothing and entertainments, but also in their choice of furnishings. [#Legal]
